thoughts: Tries to imitate the battle moves of other RotWound slugcats
Wonders if it is {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} fault or {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mentor's fault that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} ended up here
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could put {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} hunting training to use
Tries to convince another RotWound slugcat to train {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Misses eating fresh-kill and sharing tongues with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clanmates
Furiously grabs onto a branch so hard one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws snaps off
Tries to wash {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dirty hands, only to realize they're too caked with mud to clean
